answer:
1. DALLAS/FORT WORTH INTL ARPT shows the highest count of records, it needs to be further investigated whether it is caused by the number of flight records or other import reasons.

2. There are more counts around Aug, Sep, Oct. 

3. AMERICAN AIRLINES shows the highest number of records.

4. Illinois shows the highest cost_other.

5. New York and New Jersey don't have many cases, but shows quite high cost_repair.
